subject: Tennis
Clay
lead_paragraph: With a defeat of Novak Djokovic Friday at the Rome Masters, Rafael Nadal collected his 75th consecutive victory on clay, matching John McEnroe’s streak for the most victories on one surface.
snippet: With a defeat of Novak Djokovic Friday at the Rome Masters, Rafael Nadal collected his 75th consecutive victory on clay, matching John McEnroe’s streak for the most victories on one surface.
